detaileddescription.para: AMD Device Library eXtra (ADLX) is AMD's Application Programming Interface (API) library for Microsoft WindowsÂ® based driver configuration. ADLX combines stability, ease of maintenance, and multi-faceted functionality to aid in streamlining application development.
ADLX Programming Guide outlines general topics, such as system requirements, benefits of using ADLX compared to ADL, a quick-start guide, and advanced configuration.
ADLX Samples provides samples in C, C++, C#, Java and Python, demonstrating ADLX functionality implementation in basic applications.
ADLX SDK References provides descriptions for all aspects of programming with ADLX, including helpers, functions, interfaces (with their respective methods) and ADLX data types.
For more information on AMD Graphics and related SDKs, visit AMD GPUOpen.
